card.name: Heaven's Gate
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have "blocker" from your hand to the battle zone.

card.name: Romanesk, the Dragon Wizard
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature, you may put the top 4 cards of your deck into your mana zone. ■ End Step

card.name: Emeralda, Pitch Dragon Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature, you may choose one of your shields and add it to your hand. Then you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. ''(You may use "shield trigger" ability of a shield put into your hand in this way.)''

card.name: Juranail, Seven Quakes World King
card.text: ■ World Breaker ■ This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. ■ If you have 6 or less nature cards in your mana zone, this creature doesn't untap.

card.name: Miracle Star, Time Caster
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Revolution Change ■ Blocker ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone or when this creature is discarded from your hand by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or ability of a creature, you may return any number of spells that have different costs from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Q.Q.QX./Final Burial Five Sense Down
card.text: ■ Five Sense Down: Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield as the 4th card from the top of their deck horizontal instead. ■ When your opponent adds a horizontal card in their deck to their hand, they Alternate Loss Condition ■ Your opponent can't look at or rearrange the order of their deck. ■ When this creature leaves, your opponent shuffles their deck. ========================= ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures. Your opponent puts it horizontally as the 4th card from the top of their deck. ■ Put this card into the battle zone.

card.name: Scora, Dimensional Storm
card.text: ■ Gravity Zero ■ Double Breaker ■ When you summon this creature into the battle zone, if it's the first '''Scora, Dimensional Storm''' put into the battle zone during this game, take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Bat, Gashura/Blood Red Anger
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at your opponent's hand and discard a spell from it. ■ At the Start of Turn Step ========================= ■ Your opponent discards 2 cards at random from their hand and chooses 2 of their creatures and destroys them.

card.name: Bat, Gashura/Blood Red Anger
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at your opponent's hand and discard a spell from it. ■ At the Start of Turn Step ========================= ■ Your opponent discards 2 cards at random from their hand and chooses 2 of their creatures and destroys them.

card.name: Donjungle Strong Seven
card.text: ■ Mach Fighter ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, you may put a creature that has power 7000 or less from your mana zone. ■ While battling, this creature gets +6000 power. ■ Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, they must attack this creature if able.

card.name: Donjungle Strong Seven
card.text: ■ Mach Fighter ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, you may put a creature that has power 7000 or less from your mana zone. ■ While battling, this creature gets +6000 power. ■ Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, they must attack this creature if able.

card.name: Goldoza, Gorigan Crusher/Dynamouse Scrapper
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Whenever this creature attacks for the first time in a turn, untap it. ■ Last Burst ========================= ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 6000 or less.

card.name: Dasen, Unrivaled Bind/Pacific Spark
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Your opponent can only put one creature into the battle zone during their turn. ■ Last Burst ========================= ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Dasen, Unrivaled Bind/Pacific Spark
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Your opponent can only put one creature into the battle zone during their turn. ■ Last Burst ========================= ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Drap, Escalden/Maxcargo Trap
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. You may add a creature from among them to your hand, and put the rest into your mana zone. ========================= ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it into its owner's mana zone. ■ Put a creature that costs 6 or less from your mana zone into the battle zone For No Cost

card.name: Tamashiugatsu Kouseino Seisai Zett
card.text: ■ Sabaki Z ■ Choose one of your opponent's non-evolution creatures that costs 8 or less and put it Face Up ■ After you cast this spell from your hand, put it on one of your shields Face Up

card.name: Bobobo Boboho
card.text: ■ Jokers Change

card.name: Maple Chomomijin
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Kotatsumuri
card.text: ■ If you have 4 or more fire creatures in your mana zone, this creature gets "power attacker +4000" and "double breaker". ■ Your opponent's creatures can't attack players during the turn they are put. ■ When this creature attacks, it doesn't untap at the start of your next turn.

card.name: Sonandes
card.text: ■ Mach Fighter ■ Jokers Change ■ Double Breaker ■ When this creature leaves, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, return a creature from your mana zone to hand.

card.name: Meravolgal, Misfortune Demon Bangou
card.text: ■ Gate of Moonless Night ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, break 2 of your opponent's shields. Then break 2 of your shields. ■ While you have no shields, this creature gets "blocker".

card.name: Gogogo Chozetsu Rush
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Discard a card from your hand. Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total cost less than the cost of the discarded card.

card.name: Django Nyanz
card.text: ■ Neo Evolution ■ Jokers Change ■ Double Breaker ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, one of your creatures gets +5000 power and breaks an additional shield until the End Step

card.name: Nkavai, Daspell
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose 2 of your opponent's creatures. They can't attack or block until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Ukidu, Daspell
card.text: ■ Look at a player's shield. You may put it into its owner's graveyard. If you do, that player puts the top card of their deck into their shields face down. ■ Draw a card.

card.text: ■ At the End Step

card.name: Ra Tobi Tol/Kendrick Harvest
card.text: ■ Last Burst ========================= ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone, then you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

card.name: Duedyne D
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle.

card.name: Tentaikansokun
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your mana zone, one on the bottom of your deck and one on the top of your deck.

card.text: ■ Jokers Change ■ When this creature leaves, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.
